pages.text: The $(mob)Creeper$() is a common monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$(), including the surface at night. It sneakily approaches nearby players before blowing itself up.$(p)The explosion deals massive damage and also damages the landscape. It can however be prevented by getting far enough from the exploding $(mob)Creeper$().
$(mob)Creepers$() drop $(item)Gunpowder$() on death, provided they didn't explode. It is mostly used to make $(item)TNT$(), which is a stronger explosive than $(mob)Creepers$() are.
